projects.title: NITROUS
projects.description: NITROUS is a research project focused on the fundamentals of open-source intelligence (OSINT) through HTTP requests to public APIs. Developed with TypeScript, Fastify, and Next.js.

projects.title: VOLT
projects.description: VOLT is a full-stack solution for authentication and authorization, built with Fastify, Next.js, and MongoDB. It powers a seamless non-KYC crypto card platform.

projects.title: HIVE
projects.description: HIVE is a full-stack solution for a leading bio-link platform. It features a robust backend and seamless frontend integration using TypeScript, Fastify, Next.js, and MongoDB.

projects.title: slapshot.ts
projects.description: An unofficial 'Slapshot: Rebound' API Wrapper built with TypeScript and Axios.

projects.title: Catppuccin (Raycast Extension)
projects.description: Quickly view the Catppuccin color palette, userstyles, ports, and documentation within Raycast. Developed with TypeScript and React.
